column8:
Zen
This line comes from Zen. Zen often teaches the infinity and how human condition is limited and teach how to be humble to get to enlightenment. I spent a month at the Zen temple when I was child. Life was very simple there... Dedicating oneself at work like cleaning and other everyday life routine and appreciate the ordinary. Sadly I did not get wiser but definitely it was rare experience.
